Habib Dembélé (amụrụ na 19 Eprel 1962) bụ onye Mali na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nduzi, onye edemede na onye na-azọ ọkwa onye isi ala nke Mali nke afọ 2002 na 2018.
Dembélé gara Malian Institut National des Arts de Bamako (INA) mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ : Etudes Fondamentales (DEF).
Ọ na-eme ihe nkiri ma na ihuenyo. O guzobere ụlọ ọrụ Gouakoulou, ụlọ ọrụ Guimba National na Mandenka International Theatre
Ọ natara Mali's Best Actor Award n'afọ 1984
Ihe nkiri ya gụnyere The Strange Destiny of Wangrin, Hyène à jeun na Waari
Ihe nkiri ya gụnyere Guimba, le tyran na Finzan (nke Cheick Oumar Sissoko), Filon d'or (nke Sidi Diabaté) na Macadam Tribu (nke Zeca Laplaine)
Ọ bụkwa osote onye nduzi na ihe nkiri Cheick Oumar nke 1997 La genèse
Dembélé jikọtara ma rụọ ọrụ na Sophocles' Antigone na ihe odide ya gụnyere ihe nkiri dịka A vous la nuit, na akwụkwọ akụkọ Sacré Kaba
Dembélé esorowo onye nduzi ihe nkiri a ma ama Peter Brook rụọ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ egwuregwu, n'etiti ha Tragédie d'Hamlet, Tierno Bokar, na Sizwe Banzi is Dead.
N'afọ 2002 na 2018 Dembélé bụ onye na-azọ ọkwa onye isi ala nke Mali.
